alternateName: Ali Zaoua: Prince of the Streets
description: A group of children living on the street leave their gang, prompting retribution from the gang's leader. After one of the children dies, the rest try to come up with the resources to give their friend a proper burial.
name: Ali Zaoua, prince de la rue

original_info.id: Ali Zaoua: Prince of the Streets_2000
original_info.name: Ali Zaoua: Prince of the Streets

review.name: Disturbingly great, Vividly accurate
review.reviewBody: This movie brings back memories of growing up in morocco, although the movie puts you in the front seat of the realities in real life much of this goes ignored by the rest of the populace. The feeling is of numbness to the harsh realities that these vagabonds have to go through. Most of these kids never make it to adulthood and if they do they are seriously psychologically ill. After watching this movie you will undeniably feel resentment to society and blame yourself for being part of it. Overall I think the movie was well directed, the characters were AMAZING (I hope that they get some type of recognition) some of the scenes are beautifully shot. Vote 10+ from my part
